intro: Oriba, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the genus Saintpaulia and is characterized by its velvety, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of vibrant, showy flowers. Its botanical features make it a favorite among gardeners and plant enthusiasts worldwide.
